div.p: 1. Access E-Notes Center by clicking the button below. 2. Create and verify an account. 3. Sign in. 4. Subscribe to E-Notes groups. 5. Choose and verify message delivery by text or email.

Before School Breakfast starts as early as 7:30 and ends promptly at 8:00. Students will convene in the School commons area at 7:50 each morning. Breakfast will be served and classes will begin as directed by teachers. School will be dismissed at 3:25 each afternoon.

The Alex School handbook is always accessible through the Student Services menu above. Students will not receive a printed copy of the handbook this year but a printed copy is available in the Superintendent's office.
Each day, a new senior will be spotlighted! Click here! . . .

div.h4: Re-Heat Instructions for SSO Breakfast Posted Date: 03/31/2020
Remote Continuous Learning Plan Posted Date: 03/31/2020
div.p: Read APS Remote Continuous Learning Plan . . .

div.h4: NO SCHOOL - OPERATIONAL SHUTDOWN Posted Date: 03/17/2020
April 4th National ACT rescheduled. Posted Date: 03/16/2020
div.p: ACT has rescheduled their April 4th National ACT test date. Read more : http://www.act.org/content/act/en/covid-19.html?cid=social:twitter:media-thought-leadership-and-advocacy--:dc_3040-in[...] . . .

div.h4: Oklahoma Youth ExPo canceled Posted Date: 03/16/2020
div.p: Gov Stitt declares a state of emergency due to “community spread” of the COVID-19 virus. Read the newspaper article here: https://oklahoman.com/article/5657717/coronavirus-in-oklahoma-re[...] . . .
2020 Baseball Schedule- Schedule will be updated as games are added . . .
Students receiving Free and Reduced School Meals . . .
